001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.authentication;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.RestService;
004import lombok.NonNull;
005
006/**
007 * Defines the contract for authentication mechanisms.
008 *
009 * <p>Implementations of this interface handle user authentication and return an {@link AuthenticationKey}
010 * that uniquely identifies authenticated sessions.
011 *
012 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
013 */
014public interface AuthenticationClient {
015
016   /**
017    * Authenticates a user using the provided credentials.
018    *
019    * @param restService The {@link RestService} instance used to execute the authentication request.
020    * @param username    The username of the user.
021    * @param password    The password of the user.
022    * @param cache       If {@code true}, the authentication result is cached for reuse.
023    * @return The {@link AuthenticationKey} representing the authenticated session.
024    */
025   AuthenticationKey authenticate(@NonNull RestService restService, @NonNull String username,
026                                  String password, boolean cache);
027}
